metadata.dc:author: Prats, M
Basilio, E
Rivera, F
metadata.dc:description: A study has been carried out on 116 mammary neoplasias in which the prolactin receptors together with other clinical and hormonal parameters have been determined. A 46.3% frequency of PRLR+ has been obtained as well as a statistically significant correlation between these and blood estradiol (p less than 0.05). PRLR- have greater survival and PRLR may act as a growth factor.
metadata.dc:title: Receptores de prolactina y c√°ncer de mama.
[Prolactin receptors and breast cancer].
